language.content: 国际电信联盟无线电频率划分脚注
Footnotes on Radio Frequency Allocation of the International Telecommunication Union
各主管部门批准使用8.3 kHz 以下频率时，须保证不对划分在8.3 kHz 以上各频段的业务产生有害干扰。（WRC-12）

When the competent authorities approve the use of frequencies below 8.3 kHz, they must ensure that there is no harmful interference to the services divided in the frequency bands above 8.3 kHz. （WRC-12）
敦促为从事科学研究而使用8.3 kHz以下频率的主管部门，应将其使用情况告知其他可能相关的主管部门，以便使这种研究工作获得所有实际可行的保护，免受有害干扰（WRC-12）

Urge regulatory authorities using frequencies below 8.3 kHz for scientific research to inform other potentially relevant regulatory authorities of their use, in order to provide all practical and feasible protection for such research work from harmful interference (WRC-12)
气象辅助业务对8.3-11.3 kHz 频段的使用仅限于无源用途。在9-11.3 kHz 频段，气象辅助业务电台不得要求2013 年1 月1 日前向无线电通信局提交以便通知的无线电导航业务电台提供保护。对于气象辅助业务电台与该日期之后提交以便通知的无线电导航业务电台之间的共用，应适用ITU-R RS.1881 建议书的最新版本。（WRC-12）

The use of the 8.3-11.3 kHz frequency band for meteorological auxiliary services is limited to passive purposes only. In the frequency band of 9-11.3 kHz, meteorological auxiliary service radio stations shall not request protection from radio navigation service radio stations submitted to the Radio Communication Bureau for notification before January 1, 2013. For the sharing between meteorological auxiliary service stations and radio navigation service stations submitted for notification after that date, the latest version of ITU-R RS.1881 recommendation shall apply. （WRC-12）
附加划分：在阿尔及利亚、沙特阿拉伯、巴林、埃及、阿拉伯联合酋长国、俄罗斯联邦、伊朗（伊斯兰共和国）、伊拉克、科威特、黎巴嫩、摩洛哥、卡塔尔、阿拉伯叙利亚共和国、苏丹和突尼斯，8.3-9 kHz 频段亦作为主要业务划分给无线电导航、固定和移动业务。（WRC-15）

Additional division: In Algeria, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Egypt, United Arab Emirates, Russian Federation, Iran (Islamic Republic of), Iraq, Kuwait, Lebanon, Morocco, Qatar, Syrian Arab Republic, Sudan and Tunisia, the 8.3-9 kHz frequency band is also designated as the primary service for radio navigation, fixed and mobile services. （WRC-15）
附加划分：在中国，8.3-9 kHz 频段亦作为主要业务划分给水上无线电导航和水上移动业务。（WRC-12）
Additional division: In China, the 8.3-9 kHz frequency band is also classified as the main service for water radio navigation and water mobile services. （WRC-12）
附加划分：在亚美尼亚、俄罗斯联邦、格鲁吉亚、吉尔吉斯斯坦、塔吉克斯坦和土库曼斯坦，14-17kHz 频段亦划分给作为主要业务的无线电导航业务。（WRC-15）

Additional division: In Armenia, the Russian Federation, Georgia, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, and Turkmenistan, the 14-17kHz frequency band is also allocated to the radio navigation service as the main service. （WRC-15）
业务划分在14-19.95 kHz 和20.05-70 kHz 频段且在1 区亦划分在72-84 kHz 和86-90 kHz 频段的电台，可以发射标准频率和时间信号。此类电台须得到保护，免受有害干扰。在亚美尼亚、阿塞拜疆、白俄罗斯、俄罗斯联邦、格鲁吉亚、哈萨克斯坦、吉尔吉斯斯坦、塔吉克斯坦和土库曼斯坦，25 kHz 和50 kHz 频率将在同样条件下用于此用途。

Radio stations with business division in the frequency bands of 14-19.95 kHz and 20.05-70 kHz, and also in the frequency bands of 72-84 kHz and 86-90 kHz in Zone 1, can transmit standard frequency and time signals. This type of radio station must be protected from harmful interference. In Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, the Russian Federation, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, and Turkmenistan, frequencies of 25 kHz and 50 kHz will be used for this purpose under the same conditions.
水上移动业务使用14-19.95kHz、20.05-70kHz 和70-90kHz（1 区为72-84kHz和86-90kHz）各频段，限于海岸无线电报电台（仅限于A1A 和F1B）。如果必要带宽不超过有关频段内A1A 或F1B 类发射的正常使用带宽，例外地可准许使用J2B 或J7B类发射。

The water mobile service uses frequency bands of 14-19.95kHz, 20.05-70kHz, and 70-90kHz (72-84kHz and 86-90kHz in Zone 1), limited to coastal radio stations (A1A and F1B only). If the necessary bandwidth does not exceed the normal usage bandwidth for A1A or F1B class transmissions within the relevant frequency band, J2B or J7B class transmissions may be allowed on an exceptional basis.
附加划分：在亚美尼亚、阿塞拜疆、格鲁吉亚、哈萨克斯坦、吉尔吉斯斯坦、俄罗斯、塔吉克斯坦、土库曼斯坦67-70kHz 频段以主要使用条件也划分给无线电导航业务。

Additional division: The 67-70kHz frequency band in Armenia, Azerbaijan, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Russia, Tajikistan, and Turkmenistan is also designated for radio navigation services as the primary usage condition.
不同业务种类：在孟加拉国和巴基斯坦，70-72kHz 和84-86kHz 频段以主要使用条件划分给固定业务和水上移动业务（见5.33 款）。（WRC-2000）
Different types of services: In Bangladesh and Pakistan, the 70-72kHz and 84-86kHz frequency bands are mainly used for fixed services and water mobile services (see section 5.33). （WRC-2000）
在70-90 kHz（1 区为70-86kHz）和110-130 kHz（1 区为12-130kHz）频段内，可以使用脉冲无线电导航系统，条件是不对这些频段已划分的其他业务造成有害干扰。

Pulse radio navigation systems can be used in the frequency bands of 70-90 kHz (70-86 kHz in Zone 1) and 110-130 kHz (12-130 kHz in Zone 1), provided that they do not cause harmful interference to other services already assigned to these frequency bands.
在2 区，关于70-90 kHz 和110-130 kHz 频段内的水上无线电导航业务电台的建立和使用，应按照9.21 款所规定的程序与那些按频率划分表工作而其业务可能受到影响的主管部门达成协议。但是，固定业务、水上移动业务和无线电定位业务的电台不能对按照

In Zone 2, regarding the establishment and use of water radio navigation service radio stations in the frequency bands of 70-90 kHz and 110-130 kHz, agreements should be reached with the competent authorities that may be affected by the frequency division table according to the procedures specified in Article 9.21. However, radio stations for fixed services, water mobile services, and wireless positioning services cannot comply with the regulations
促请在90-110 kHz 频段内运用无线电导航业务电台的主管部门协调其技术和操作特性，以防止这些电台提供的业务遭受有害干扰。

Urge the competent authorities using radio navigation service stations in the 90-110 kHz frequency band to coordinate their technical and operational characteristics to prevent harmful interference to the services provided by these stations.

已废止。（SUP-WRC-97）
	5.64  固定业务电台在划分给该业务的90 kHz 与160 kHz（在1 区为148.5 kHz）之间频段内和水上移动业务电台在划分给该业务的110 kHz 与160 kHz（在1 区为148.5 kHz）之间频段内，只准使用A1A 或F1B、A2C、A3C、F1C 或F3C 类发射。水上移动业务电台在110 kHz 与160 kHz（1 区为148.5 kHz）之间频段内，例外地也可准予使用J2B 或J7B 类发射。

It has been abolished. （SUP-WRC-97）
5.64 Fixed service radio stations are only allowed to use A1A or F1B, A2C, A3C, F1C or F3C transmission within the frequency band between 90 kHz and 160 kHz (148.5 kHz in Zone 1) allocated for this service, and water mobile service radio stations within the frequency band between 110 kHz and 160 kHz (148.5 kHz in Zone 1) allocated for this service. Within the frequency range between 110 kHz and 160 kHz (148.5 kHz in Zone 1), water mobile service radio stations may also be allowed to use J2B or J7B type transmissions with exceptions.

不同业务种类：在孟加拉国，112-117.6 kHz 和126-129 kHz 频段，以主要使用条件划分给固定业务和水上移动业务（见5.33 款）。（WRC-2000）
5.66  不同业务种类：在德国，115-117.6 kHz 频段，以主要使用条件划分给固定业务和水上移动业务（见5.33 款），并以次要使用条件划分给无线电导航业务（见5.32 款）。

Different types of services: In Bangladesh, the 112-117.6 kHz and 126-129 kHz frequency bands are divided into fixed services and water mobile services based on their primary usage conditions (see section 5.33). （WRC-2000）
5.66 Different types of services: In Germany, the 115-117.6 kHz frequency band is divided into fixed services and water mobile services based on primary usage conditions (see section 5.33), and into radio navigation services based on secondary usage conditions (see section 5.32).
附加划分：在蒙古国、吉尔吉斯斯坦和土库曼斯坦，130-148.5kHz 频段亦划分给作为次要业务的无线电导航业务。在这些国家内和国家间，此项业务具有平等运行权。

Additional division: In Mongolia, Kyrgyzstan, and Turkmenistan, the 130-148.5kHz frequency band is also allocated to radio navigation services as a secondary service. Within and between these countries, this business has equal operational rights.
替代划分：在安哥拉、博茨瓦纳、布隆迪、中非共和国、刚果共和国、埃塞俄比亚、肯尼亚、莱索托、马达加斯加、马拉维、莫桑比克、纳米比亚、尼日利亚、阿曼、刚果民主共和国、南非、斯威士兰、坦桑尼亚、乍得、赞比亚和津巴布韦，200-283.5 kHz频段划分给作为主要业务的航空无线电导航业务。（WRC-12）

Alternative division: in Angola, Botswana, Burundi, the Central African Republic, the Republic of the Congo, Ethiopia, Kenya, Lesotho, Madagascar, Malawi, Mozambique, Namibia, Nigeria, Oman, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, South Africa, Eswatini, Tanzania, Chad, Zambia and Zimbabwe, the 200-283.5 kHz frequency band is divided into aviation radio navigation services as the main business. （WRC-12）
替代划分：在突尼斯，255-283.5kHz 频段以主要使用条件划分给广播业务。
Alternative allocation: In Tunisia, the 255-283.5kHz frequency band is allocated to broadcasting services as the primary usage condition.

已废止。（SUP-WRC-12）
5.73  在285-325kHz（1 区为283.5-325kHz）频段，在不对无线电导航业务无线电信标电台造成有害干扰的条件下，水上无线电导航业务可以使用窄带技术发送补充导航信息。

It has been abolished. （SUP-WRC-12）
5.73 In the frequency band of 285-325kHz (283.5-325kHz in Zone 1), underwater radio navigation services can use narrowband technology to send supplementary navigation information without causing harmful interference to the radio beacon stations of the radio navigation service.
不同业务种类：在亚美尼亚、阿塞拜疆、白俄罗斯、俄罗斯联邦、格鲁吉亚、摩尔多瓦、吉尔吉斯斯坦、塔吉克斯坦、土库曼斯坦、乌克兰以及罗马尼亚的黑海地区，315-325kHz 频段划分给作为主要业务的水上无线电导航业务。条件是在波罗的海地区，将该频段内的频率指配给水上或航空无线电导航业务的新电台时，必须在相关主管部门之间事先达成协议。（WRC-07）

Different types of services: In the Black Sea region of Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, the Russian Federation, Georgia, Moldova, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Ukraine, and Romania, the 315-325kHz frequency band is allocated to the maritime radio navigation service as the main service. The condition is that in the Baltic region, when assigning frequencies within this frequency band to new radio stations for maritime or aviation radio navigation services, an agreement must be reached in advance between the relevant regulatory authorities. （WRC-07）
410kHz 频率在水上无线电导航业务中被指定用于无线电测向。在405-415kHz频段内的其他无线电导航业务对406.5-413.5kHz 频段内的无线电测向不应造成有害干扰。

The 410kHz frequency is designated for wireless direction finding in maritime radio navigation services. Other radio navigation services in the 405-415kHz frequency band should not cause harmful interference to radio direction finding in the 406.5-413.5 kHz frequency band.

不同业务种类：在澳大利亚、中国、法国在3 区的海外属地、大韩民国、印度、伊朗伊斯兰共和国、日本、巴基斯坦、巴布亚新几内亚和斯里兰卡，415-495 kHz 频段作为主要业务划分给航空无线电导航业务。在亚美尼亚、阿塞拜疆、白俄罗斯、俄罗斯联邦、哈萨克斯坦、拉脱维亚、乌兹别克斯坦和吉尔吉斯斯坦，435-495 kHz 频段划分给作为主要业务的航空无线电导航业务。前述所有国家的主管部门须采取一切必要的切实可行措施，

Different types of business: in overseas territories of Australia, China, France in Zone 3, South Korea, India, Iran (Islamic Republic of), Japan, Pakistan, Papua New Guinea, and Sri Lanka, the 415-495 kHz frequency band is primarily allocated to aviation radio navigation services. In Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, the Russian Federation, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Uzbekistan, and Kyrgyzstan, the 435-495 kHz frequency band is allocated to the aviation radio navigation service as its main business. The competent authorities of all the aforementioned countries shall take all necessary and feasible measures,
不同种业务种类：在古巴、美国和墨西哥，415-435kHz 频段以主要使用条件划分给航空无线电导航业务。
Different types of services: In Cuba, the United States, and Mexico, the 415-435kHz frequency band is primarily used for aviation radio navigation services.
水上移动业务使用415-495kHz 和505-526.5kHz（2 区为505-510kHz）频段限于无线电报。
The use of 415-495kHz and 505-526.5kHz (505-510kHz in Zone 2) frequency bands for water mobile services is limited to wireless telegraphy.
当建立使用490kHz、518kHz 和4209.5kHz 频率的NAVTEX（警告、气象信息和紧急信息系统）业务海岸电台时，强烈建议各主管部门按照国际海事组织（IMO）的程序协调其操作特性（见第339 号决议（WRC-07，修订版））。（WRC-07）

When establishing NAVTEX (Warning, Meteorological Information and Emergency Information System) coastal radio stations using frequencies of 490kHz, 518kHz and 4209.5kHz, it is strongly recommended that the competent authorities coordinate their operational characteristics in accordance with the procedures of the International Maritime Organization (IMO) (see Resolution 339 (WRC-07, revised version)). （WRC-07）
在2 区，航空无线电导航业务使用435-495kHz 频段，限于不是采用声音传输的全向信标。
In Zone 2, the aviation radio navigation service uses the 435-495kHz frequency band, limited to omnidirectional beacons that do not use sound transmission.
使用472-479 kHz 频段内频率的业余业务电台最大等效全向辐射功率（e.i.r.p.）不得超过1 W。各主管部门可在其距离阿尔及利亚、沙特阿拉伯、阿塞拜疆、巴林、白俄罗斯、中国、科摩罗、吉布提、埃及、阿拉伯联合酋长国、俄罗斯联邦、伊朗伊斯兰共和

The maximum equivalent omnidirectional radiated power (e.i.r.p.) of amateur radio stations using frequencies within the 472-479 kHz frequency band shall not exceed 1 W. Each competent authority may, within its distance from Algeria, Saudi Arabia, Azerbaijan, Bahrain, Belarus, China, Comoros, Djibouti, Egypt, United Arab Emirates, Russian Federation, Iran (Islamic Republic of)
在阿尔及利亚、沙特阿拉伯、阿塞拜疆、巴林、白俄罗斯、中国、科摩罗、吉布提、埃及、阿拉伯联合酋长国、俄罗斯联邦、伊拉克、约旦、哈萨克斯坦、科威特、黎
In Algeria, Saudi Arabia, Azerbaijan, Bahrain, Belarus, China, Comoros, Djibouti, Egypt, United Arab Emirates, Russian Federation, Iraq, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kuwait, Lebanon
已废止。（SUP-WRC-2000）
It has been abolished. （SUP-WRC-2000）
在水上移动业务中，490 kHz 频率专门用于海岸电台通过窄带直接印字电报向船舶发送导航和气象告警及紧急信息。第31 和52 条对490 kHz 频率的使用条件做了规定。要求各主管部门在航空无线电导航业务使用415-495 kHz 频段时，保证不对490 kHz 频率

In water mobile services, the 490 kHz frequency is specifically used for coastal radio stations to send navigation and weather warnings and emergency information to ships through narrowband direct printing telegrams. Articles 31 and 52 specify the conditions for the use of 490 kHz frequency. Require all regulatory authorities to ensure that the 415-495 kHz frequency band used in aviation radio navigation services does not exceed the 490 kHz frequency range
在2 区，525-535kHz 频段内，广播电台的载波功率白天不得超过1kW，夜间不得超过250W。
In Zone 2, within the 525-535kHz frequency band, the carrier power of broadcasting stations shall not exceed 1kW during the day and 250W at night.

附加划分：在安哥拉、博茨瓦纳、莱索托、马拉维、莫桑比克、纳米比亚、尼日尔和斯威士兰，526.5-535 kHz 频段亦划分给作为次要业务的移动业务。（WRC-12）5.87A  附加划分：在乌兹别克斯坦，526.5-1606.5kHz 频段以主要使用条件也划分给无线电导航业务。这种使用应按照9.21 款与相关主管部门达成协议，并限于1997 年10 月27 日已在使用的岸基无线电信标，直至设备报废为止。（WRC-97）
5.88  附加划分：在中国，526.5-535kHz 频段以次要使用条件也划分给航空无线电导航业务。

Additional division: In Angola, Botswana, Lesotho, Malawi, Mozambique, Namibia, Niger and Eswatini, the 526.5-535 kHz frequency band is also divided into mobile services as secondary services. (WRC-12) 5.87A Additional Allocation: In Uzbekistan, the 526.5-1606.5kHz frequency band is also allocated to radio navigation services as the primary usage condition. This use should be agreed upon with the relevant regulatory authorities in accordance with Article 9.21 and limited to shore based wireless beacons that were already in use on October 27, 1997, until the equipment is scrapped. （WRC-97）
5.88 Additional Allocation: In China, the 526.5-535kHz frequency band and subsequent usage conditions are also allocated to aviation radio navigation services.
在2 区，广播业务电台使用1605-1705kHz 频段应遵守区域性无线电行政大会（1988 年，里约热内卢）制定的规划。
In Zone 2, broadcasting service stations using the 1605-1705kHz frequency band should comply with the plan formulated by the Regional Radio Administration Conference (Rio de Janeiro, 1988).
在1605-1705kHz 频段内，如涉及到2 区的广播电台，1 区内的水上移动电台的服务区应限于地面波传播提供的范围。

In the frequency range of 1605-1705kHz, if it involves broadcasting stations in Zone 2, the service area of water mobile stations in Zone 1 should be limited to the range provided by ground wave propagation.

附加划分：在菲律宾和斯里兰卡，1606.5-1705kHz 频段以次要使用条件也划分给广播业务。（WRC-97）
5.92  1 区的一些国家，在1606.5-1625kHz、1635-1800kHz、1850-2160kHz、2194- 2300kHz、2502-2850kHz 和3500-3800kHz 频段内使用无线电测定系统，应按照9.21 款达成协议。这些电台的平均辐射功率不得超过50W。

Additional division: In the Philippines and Sri Lanka, the 1606.5-1705kHz frequency band is also assigned to broadcasting services as a secondary usage condition. （WRC-97）
Some countries in Zone 1 of 5.92, using radio measurement systems in the frequency bands of 1606.5-1625kHz, 1635-1800kHz, 1850-160kHz, 2194-2300kHz, 2502-2850kHz, and 3500-3800kHz, should reach an agreement in accordance with Clause 9.21. The average radiated power of these radio stations shall not exceed 50W.

附加划分：在亚美尼亚、阿塞拜疆、白俄罗斯、俄罗斯联邦、格鲁吉亚、匈牙利、哈萨克斯坦、拉脱维亚、立陶宛、蒙古、尼日利亚、乌兹别克斯坦、波兰、吉尔吉斯斯坦、斯洛伐克、塔吉克斯坦、乍得、土库曼斯坦和乌克兰，1 625-1 635 kHz、1 800-1 810 kHz 和2 160-2 170 kHz 频段亦划分给作为主要业务的固定和陆地移动业务，但须按照第9.21 款达成协议。（WRC-15）
5.94  没使用。

Additional division: In Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Russian Federation, Georgia, Hungary, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Mongolia, Nigeria, Uzbekistan, Poland, Kyrgyzstan, Slovakia, Tajikistan, Chad, Turkmenistan, and Ukraine, the 1625-1635 kHz, 1800-1810 kHz, and 2160-2170 kHz frequency bands are also allocated to fixed and land mobile services as the main business, subject to agreement in accordance with Article 9.21. （WRC-15）
5.94 not used.
没使用。
Not used.
在德国、亚美尼亚、奥地利、阿塞拜疆、白俄罗斯、克罗地亚、丹麦、爱沙尼亚、俄罗斯联邦、芬兰、格鲁吉亚、匈牙利、爱尔兰、冰岛、以色列、哈萨克斯坦、拉脱维亚、列支敦士登、立陶宛、马耳他、摩尔多瓦、挪威、乌兹别克斯坦、波兰、吉尔吉斯斯

In Germany, Armenia, Austria, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Croatia, Denmark, Estonia, Russian Federation, Finland, Georgia, Hungary, Ireland, Iceland, Israel, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Malta, Moldova, Norway, Uzbekistan, Poland, Kyrgyzstan

In Zone 1, when assigning frequencies to fixed and mobile service radio stations within the frequency bands of 1850-2045kHz, 2194-2498kHz, 2502-2625kHz, and 2650-2850kHz, the competent authority should pay attention to the special needs of water mobile services.

在2 区，除格陵兰外，在2065-2107kHz 频段内使用无线电话的海岸电台和船舶电台应该限于J3E 类发射，其峰值功率不得超过1kW。最好选用下述载波频率：2065.0kHz、2079.0kHz、2082.5kHz、2086.0kHz、2093.0kHz、2096.5kHz、2100.0kHz 和2103.5kHz。在阿根廷和乌拉圭，载波频率2068.5kHz 和2075.5kHz 也用于此目的，而在2072-2075.5kHz 频段内的频率按52.165 款的规定使用。

In Zone 2, except for Greenland, coastal and ship radio stations using wireless telephones in the 2065-2107kHz frequency band should be limited to J3E class transmissions, with peak power not exceeding 1kW. It is best to choose the following carrier frequencies: 2065.0kHz, 2079.0kHz, 2082.5kHz, 2086.0kHz, 2093.0kHz, 2096.5kHz, 2100.0kHz, and 2103.5kHz. In Argentina and Uruguay, carrier frequencies of 2068.5kHz and 2075.5kHz are also used for this purpose, while frequencies within the 2072-2075.5kHz frequency range are used according to the provisions of section 52.165.
在2 区和3 区，仅在本国境内通信的固定业务电台在不对水上移动业务造成有害干扰的条件下，可使用2065kHz 与2107kHz 之间的频率，其平均功率不得超过50W。在通知频率时，应提请通信局注意这些规定。

In Zone 2 and Zone 3, fixed service radio stations that communicate only within their own country may use frequencies between 2065kHz and 2107kHz, with an average power not exceeding 50W, without causing harmful interference to water mobile services. When notifying the frequency, these regulations should be brought to the attention of the communication bureau.

Additional allocation: In Algeria, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, China, Russian Federation, France, Iran (Islamic Republic of), Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Ukraine, and Vietnam, the 154-156 MHz frequency band is also allocated to the radio positioning service as the main service. The operation of radio positioning service stations in the 154-156 MHz frequency band must reach an agreement in accordance with Article 9.21. In order to determine the potential affected authorities in Zone 1, the instantaneous field strength value of 12dB (μ V/m) generated within 10% of the time at a height of 10 meters above the ground within the 25 kHz reference frequency band of any other authority's territorial boundary must be used. 空间研究业务对410-420 MHz 频段的使用仅限于与在轨的、载人航天器进行空对空通信的链路。410-420 MHz 频段空间研究业务（空对空）发射电台发射产生的地球表面的功率通量密度对于 0°≤≤5°不得超过153dB（W/m2），5°≤≤70°不得超过153+0.077(5)dB（W/m2），70°≤≤90°时不得超过148 dB（W/m2），其中指无线电波的到达角，参考带宽为4 kHz。在此频段内，空间研究业务（空对空）电台不得对固定和移动业务电台提出保护要求，亦不得限制其使用。第4.10 款不适用。（WRC-15）

Within this frequency band, space research service (air-to-air) radio stations shall not make protection requirements for fixed and mobile service radio stations, nor shall they restrict their use. Clause 4.10 is not applicable. （WRC-15）

In the following two countries: Argentina, Colombia, Costa Rica, Ecuador, Mexico, and Uruguay, the 300-3400 MHz frequency band has been designated for the implementation of International Mobile Telecommunications (IMT). IMT stations for mobile services shall not cause harmful interference to the radio positioning service system during the use of 300-3400 MHz, nor shall they seek its protection. The regulatory authorities wishing to implement IMT must obtain the consent of their neighboring countries to protect the operation of radio positioning services. This determination does not prevent business applications that have already obtained allocation in these frequency bands from using this frequency band, nor does it determine priority in the Radio Regulations. （WRC-15）

In South Korea, Japan, and Pakistan, the 3 400-3 500 MHz frequency band has been designated for International Mobile Telecommunications (IMT). This determination does not hinder the use of the frequency band by services that have already been allocated within that frequency band, and there is no priority determined in the Radio Regulations. During the coordination phase, the provisions of clauses 9.17 and 9.18 also apply. Before the competent authority activates mobile service stations (base stations or mobile stations) within this frequency band, it should be ensured that the power flux density (pfd) generated at a height of 3 meters above the ground boundary of any other competent authority does not exceed -154.5 dB (W/(m2  4 kHz)) for more than 20% of the time. With the consent of any national regulatory authority, the limit may be exceeded on its territory. In order to ensure compliance with the PFD limit at the territorial boundary of any other competent authority, the relevant calculations and verifications should take into account all relevant information and be obtained from both competent authorities (the competent authority responsible for the ground station and the competent authority responsible for the earth station)

In the overseas territories of Australia, Bangladesh, China, France in Zone 3, South Korea, India, Iran (Islamic Republic of), Japan, New Zealand, Pakistan, and the Philippines, 3500-3600 MHz has been designated for International Mobile Telecommunications (IMT). This determination does not hinder the use of the frequency band by services that have already been allocated within that frequency band, and there is no priority determined in the Radio Regulations. During the coordination phase, the provisions of clauses 9.17 and 9.18 also apply. Before the competent authority activates mobile service stations (base stations or mobile stations) within this frequency band, it should be ensured that the power flux density (pfd) generated at a height of 3 meters above the ground boundary of any other competent authority does not exceed -154.5 dB (W/(m2  4 kHz)) for more than 20% of the time. With the consent of any national regulatory authority, the limit may be exceeded on its territory. In order to ensure compliance with the PFD limit at the territorial boundary of any other competent authority, the relevant calculations and verifications should take into account all relevant information and obtain the consent of both competent authorities (the competent authority responsible for the ground station and the competent authority responsible for the earth station)

在加拿大、哥伦比亚、哥斯达黎加和美国，3 600-3 700 MHz 频段或其部分，确定由希望实施国际移动通信（IMT）的主管部门使用。这种确定不妨碍已在该频段内获得划分的业务使用该频段，亦未在《无线电规则》中确定优先权。在协调阶段，第9.17 和9.18 款的规定亦适用。某主管部门在启用IMT 系统的基站或移动台站之前，须根据第9.21款寻求其它主管部门的同意，并确保这些设备在所有其它相邻主管部门边境处地面上方3米产生的功率通量密度（pfd），超过−154.5 dB(W/(m2 4 kHz))的时间不多于20%。经相关国家主管部门同意，其领土上的该限值可以超出。为保证在任何其它主管部门的领土边界处能够符合该pfd 限值，有关的计算和验证须在考虑到所有相关资料并在已获得双方主管部门（负责地面电台的主管部门和负责地球站的主管部门）同意的情况下进行，并在必要时请求无线电通信局予以帮助。在未达成协议的情况下，pfd 限值的计算和验证须由无线电通信局在顾及上述资料的情况下进行。3 600-3 700 MHz 频段的移动业务台站，包括IMT系统，不得要求空间电台提供超出《无线电规则》（2004 年版）表21-4 所规定的保护。

In Canada, Colombia, Costa Rica, and the United States, the 3600-3700 MHz frequency band or parts thereof are designated for use by regulatory authorities wishing to implement International Mobile Telecommunications (IMT). This determination does not hinder the use of the frequency band by services that have already been allocated within that frequency band, nor does it determine priority in the Radio Regulations. During the coordination phase, the provisions of clauses 9.17 and 9.18 also apply. Before using IMT system base stations or mobile stations, a certain regulatory authority must seek the consent of other regulatory authorities in accordance with Article 9.21 and ensure that the power flux density (pfd) generated by these devices at a height of 3 meters above the ground at the border of all other adjacent regulatory authorities does not exceed -154.5 dB (W/(m2  4 kHz) for more than 20% of the time. With the consent of the relevant national regulatory authorities, the limit on its territory may be exceeded. To ensure compliance with the PFD limit at the territorial boundaries of any other competent authority, relevant calculations and verifications must be carried out taking into account all relevant information and with the consent of both competent authorities (the competent authority responsible for ground stations and the competent authority responsible for earth stations), and requesting assistance from the Radio Communication Bureau if necessary. In the absence of an agreement, the calculation and verification of PFD limits must be carried out by the Radio Communication Bureau, taking into account the above information. Mobile service stations in the 3600-3700 MHz frequency band, including IMT systems, shall not require space stations to provide protection beyond that specified in Table 21-4 of the Radio Regulations (2004 edition).
在日本，在3 620-3 700 MHz 频段内不包括无线电定位业务。

Satellite fixed services should use the 4 500-4 800 MHz (air to ground) and 6 725-7 025 MHz (ground to air) frequency bands in accordance with Appendix 30B. The implementation of IMT using this frequency band requires an agreement with neighboring countries, and IMT stations must not request protection from other mobile service application stations. This use must comply with the requirements of Resolution 233 (WRC-15, revised version).

在柬埔寨、老挝（人民民主共和国）和越南，4 800-4 990 MHz 全部或部分频段确定由有意实施国际移动通信（IMT）的主管部门使用。这种确定不妨碍已在该频段内获得划分的业务应用使用该频段，而且未在《无线电规则》中确定优先权。使用该频段实施IMT 须按照第9.21 款与相关的主管部门达成协议。而且IMT 台站不得寻求其他移动业务的应用台站的保护。此外，主管部门在启用移动业务IMT 台站之前，须确保该台站在距离该沿岸国正式认可的作为低水位线的海岸20 公里处海平面以上19 公里以内产生的功率通量密度不超过−155 dB(W/(m2 · 1 MHz))。此标准须由WRC-19 进行审议。见第223 号决议（WRC-15，修订版）。该确定须在WRC-19 之后生效。  (WRC-15)

In Cambodia, Laos (People's Democratic Republic of), and Vietnam, all or part of the 4800-4990 MHz frequency band is designated for use by regulatory authorities interested in implementing International Mobile Telecommunications (IMT). This determination does not prevent business applications that have already been allocated within the frequency band from using the frequency band, and priority has not been determined in the Radio Regulations. The implementation of IMT using this frequency band must be agreed upon with the relevant regulatory authorities in accordance with Article 9.21. Moreover, IMT stations are not allowed to seek protection from other mobile service application stations. In addition, the competent authority must ensure that the power flux density generated by the mobile service IMT station within 19 kilometers above sea level at a distance of 20 kilometers from the coast officially recognized as a low water mark by the coastal country does not exceed -155 dB (W/(m2 · 1 MHz)) before using it. This standard must be reviewed by WRC-19. Refer to Resolution No. 223 (WRC-15, revised version). This determination must take effect after WRC-19. (WRC-15)
在4 825-4 835 MHz 和4 950-4 990 MHz 频段，对移动业务的划分限于除航空
In the frequency bands of 4825-4835MHz and 4950-4990MHz, the division of mobile services is limited to except aviation
不同业务种类：在阿根廷、澳大利亚和加拿大，4 825-4 835 MHz 和4 950-4 990 MHz 频段以主要使用条件划分给射电天文业务（见5.33 款）。

Different types of services: In Argentina, Australia, and Canada, the 4 825-4 835 MHz and 4 950-4 990 MHz frequency bands are primarily allocated to radio astronomy services based on their usage conditions (see section 5.33).
已废止。（SUP-WRC-03）
It has been abolished. （SUP-WRC-03）
在5 000-5 030 MHz 和5 091-5 150 MHz 频段，卫星航空移动（R）业务须按照第9.21 款达成协议。卫星航空移动（R）业务对这些频段的使用，仅限于国际标准的航空系统。（WRC-12）

In the frequency bands of 5000-5030 MHz and 5091-5 150 MHz, the satellite aviation mobile (R) service must reach an agreement in accordance with Article 9.21. The use of these frequency bands by satellite aviation mobile (R) services is limited to international standard aviation systems. （WRC-12）

为了不对5 030 MHz 以上频段内工作的微波着陆系统产生有害干扰，在5 010-5 030 MHz 频段内运营的卫星无线电导航业务系统（空对地）的所有空间电台于5 030-5 150 MHz 频段内产生的地表集总功率通量密度，在150 kHz 频段内不得超过–124.5 dB（W/m2）。为了不对4 990-5 000 MHz 频段内的射电天文业务产生有害干扰，在5 010-5 030 MHz 频段内运营的卫星无线电导航业务系统须符合第741 号决议（WRC-15，修订版）中确定的4 990-5 000 MHz 频段内的限值。（WRC-15）

In order to avoid harmful interference to microwave landing systems operating in the frequency band above 5030 MHz, the total surface power flux density generated by all space stations of the satellite radio navigation service system (air to ground) operating in the frequency band of 5010-5030 MHz in the frequency band of 5030-5 150 MHz shall not exceed -124.5 dB (W/m2) in the frequency band of 150 kHz. In order to avoid harmful interference to radio astronomy services in the frequency range of 4990-5000 MHz, satellite radio navigation service systems operating in the frequency range of 5010-5030 MHz must comply with the limits established in Resolution 741 (WRC-15, revised version) for the frequency range of 4990-5000 MHz. （WRC-15）

航空移动（R）业务对5 030-5 091 MHz 频段的使用，仅限于国际标准的航空系统。5 030-5 091 MHz 频段内的航空移动（R）业务的无用发射须限制在可为相邻5 010-5 030 MHz 频段的RNSS 系统下行链路提供保护的限度之内。在相关ITU-R 建议书确定适当数值之前，在5 010-5 030 MHz 频段内，任何AM(R)S 台站均应使用−75 dBW/MHz 的e.i.r.p.

The use of the 5030-5091 MHz frequency band for aviation mobile (R) services is limited to international standard aviation systems. The useless transmission of aviation mobile (R) services in the frequency band of 5030-5091 MHz must be limited to the limit that can provide protection for the downlink of the RNSS system in the adjacent frequency band of 5010-5030 MHz. Before determining appropriate values in the relevant ITU-R recommendations, any AM (R) S station in the frequency band of 5010-5030 MHz should use e.i.r.p. at -75 dBW/MHz
在5 030-5 091 MHz 频段，卫星航空移动（R）业务须按照第9.11A 款进行协调。卫星航空移动（R）业务对此频段的使用，仅限于国际标准的航空系统。（WRC-12）

In the frequency band of 5030-5091 MHz, satellite aviation mobile (R) services must be coordinated in accordance with Section 9.11A. The use of this frequency band by satellite aviation mobile (R) services is limited to international standard aviation systems. （WRC-12）
5 030-5 150 MHz 频段计划用于实施精确进场和着陆的国际标准系统（微波着陆系统）。在5 030-5 091 MHz 频段内，该系统的需求须优先于该频段内的其它用途。使用5 091-5 150 MHz 频段时，第5.444A 款和第114 号决议（WRC-15，修订版）适用。

The 5 030-5 150 MHz frequency band is planned to be used for implementing the international standard system for precise approach and landing (microwave landing system). In the frequency band of 5030-5091 MHz, the requirements of this system must take priority over other uses within that frequency band. When using the 5091-5 150 MHz frequency band, Article 5.444A and Resolution 114 (WRC-15, revised version) apply.

在5 091-5 150 MHz 频段卫星固定业务（地对空）划分的使用仅限于卫星移动业务非对地静止卫星系统的馈线链路，并须按照第9.11A 款进行协调。卫星移动业务非对地静止卫星系统的馈线链路对5 091-5 150 MHz 频段的使用须适用第114 号决议（WRC-15，修订版）。此外，为确保保护航空无线电导航业务免受有害干扰，与操作航空无线电导航业务地面站的主管部门领土的间隔距离小于450 公里时，卫星移动业务非对地静止卫星系统的馈线链路地球站需要进行协调。（WRC-15）

The use of satellite fixed services (ground to air) division in the 5091-5 150 MHz frequency band is limited to feeder links of non geostationary satellite systems for satellite mobile services and must be coordinated in accordance with Section 9.11A. The use of feeder links in non geostationary satellite systems for satellite mobile services in the 5091-5 150 MHz frequency band shall be subject to Resolution 114 (WRC-15, revised version). In addition, to ensure the protection of aviation radio navigation services from harmful interference, when the distance between the competent authority operating the aviation radio navigation service ground station and the territory is less than 450 kilometers, the feeder link earth station of the satellite mobile service non geostationary satellite system needs to be coordinated. （WRC-15）
航空移动业务对5 091-5 150 MHz频段的使用限于：
The use of the 5091-5 150 MHz frequency band by aviation mobile services is limited to:
没使用。
Not used.

Additional allocation: In the countries listed in section 5.369, the frequency band of 5150-5216 MHz is also allocated as
航空移动业务以外的移动业务电台使用5 150-5 350 MHz 和5 470-5 725 MHz频段时须遵守第229 号决议（WRC-12，修订版）。（WRC-12）
Mobile service radio stations outside of aviation mobile services must comply with Resolution 229 (WRC-12, revised version) when using the frequency bands of 5150-5350 MHz and 5470-5725 MHz. （WRC-12）
在5 150-5 250 MHz 频段内，移动业务电台不得对卫星固定业务地球站提出干扰保护要求。5.43A 款的规定不再适用于与卫星固定业务地球站相关的移动业务。

Within the frequency range of 5150-5250 MHz, mobile service radio stations are not allowed to request interference protection from satellite fixed service earth stations. The provisions of Article 5.43A no longer apply to mobile services related to satellite fixed service earth stations.

附加划分：在1 区（阿尔及利亚、沙特阿拉伯、巴林、埃及、阿拉伯联合酋长国、约旦、科威特、黎巴嫩、摩洛哥、阿曼、卡塔尔、阿拉伯叙利亚共和国、苏丹、南苏丹和突尼斯除外）和在巴西，5 150-5 250 MHz 频段亦划分给作为主要业务的航空移动业务，但仅限于按照第418 号决议（WRC-12，修订版）从航空器电台进行的航空遥测发射（见第1.83 款）。这些电台不得要求按照第5 条操作的其它电台提供保护。第5.43A 款不适用。（WRC-12）

Additional division: In Zone 1 (excluding Algeria, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Egypt, United Arab Emirates, Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Morocco, Oman, Qatar, Syrian Arab Republic, Sudan, South Sudan, and Tunisia) and in Brazil, the 5150-5250 MHz frequency band is also allocated to the aviation mobile service as the primary service, but only for aviation telemetry transmissions from aircraft radio stations in accordance with Resolution 418 (WRC-12, revised version) (see Section 1.83). These radio stations shall not request protection from other radio stations operating in accordance with Article 5. Clause 5.43A is not applicable. （WRC-12）
附加划分：在科特迪瓦、埃及、以色列、黎巴嫩、阿拉伯叙利亚共和国和突尼斯，5 150-5 250 MHz 频段亦划分给作为主要业务的移动业务，但须按照第9.21 款达成协议。在这种情况下，第229 号决议（WRC-12，修订版）的规定不适用。（WRC-12）

Additional allocation: In C ô te d'Ivoire, Egypt, Israel, Lebanon, the Syrian Arab Republic, and Tunisia, the 5150-5250 MHz frequency band is also allocated to mobile services as the main business, but an agreement must be reached in accordance with Article 9.21. In this case, the provisions of Resolution 229 (WRC-12, revised version) do not apply. （WRC-12）
对卫星固定（地对空）业务的划分限于卫星移动业务的非对地静止卫星系统的馈线链路，并应按照9.11A 款进行协调。

The division of satellite fixed (ground to air) services is limited to the feeder links of non geostationary satellite systems for satellite mobile services, and should be coordinated in accordance with clause 9.11A.
附加划分：5 150-5 216 MHz 频段以主要使用条件也划分给卫星固定（空对地）业务。该划分限用于卫星移动业务的非对地静止卫星系统的馈线链路，并应符合9.11A 款的规定。5 150-5 216 MHz 频段内空对地方向操作的卫星固定业务的空间电台产生的、在地球表面的功率通量密度在任何情况下对所有到达角都不得超过每4 kHz 频段内164 dB（W/m2）。

Additional division: The frequency band of 5150-5216 MHz is also allocated to satellite fixed (air to ground) services as the main usage condition. This division is limited to feeder links of non geostationary satellite systems for satellite mobile services and shall comply with the provisions of Article 9.11A. The power flux density generated by the space station of the satellite fixed service operating in the air to ground direction in the frequency band of 5 150-5 216 MHz on the Earth's surface shall not exceed -164 dB (W/m2) per 4 kHz frequency band for all arrival angles under any circumstances.

对按照5.447A 和5.447B 款操作的5 150-5 250 MHz 频段内的卫星固定业务网络负责的主管部门，应按照9.11A 款在平等的基础上与按照5.446 款操作、并于1995 年11月17 日以前启用的非对地静止卫星网络的负责主管部门进行协调。按照5.446 款操作、并于1995 年11 月17 日以后使用的卫星网络不得对按照5.447A 和5.447B 款操作的卫星固定业务电台提出保护要求并且不能造成有害干扰。

The competent authority responsible for satellite fixed service networks operating in the 5150-5250 MHz frequency band according to 5.447A and 5.447B shall coordinate with the competent authority responsible for non geostationary satellite networks operating in accordance with 5.446 and activated before November 17, 1995 on an equal basis according to 9.11A. Satellite networks operated in accordance with 5.446 and used after November 17, 1995 shall not impose protection requirements on satellite fixed service radio stations operated in accordance with 5.447A and 5.447B, and shall not cause harmful interference.
5 250-5 255 MHz 频段以主要使用条件划分给空间研究业务，只限于星载有源传感器。空间研究业务对此频段的其他使用为次要使用条件。（WRC-97）

The 5250-5255 MHz frequency band is primarily allocated for space research services, limited to onboard active sensors. Other uses of this frequency band are secondary conditions for space research operations. （WRC-97）
附加划分：在下列3 区国家，5 250-5 350 MHz 频段亦划分给作为主要业务的固定业务：澳大利亚、韩国、印度、印度尼西亚、伊朗（伊斯兰共和国）、日本、马来西亚、

Additional division: In the following three countries, the 5250-5350 MHz frequency band is also allocated to fixed services as the main business: Australia, South Korea, India, Indonesia, Iran (Islamic Republic of), Japan, Malaysia
附加划分：在阿塞拜疆、吉尔吉斯斯坦、罗马尼亚和土库曼斯坦，5 250-5 350 MHz 频段亦划分给作为主要业务的无线电导航业务。（WRC-12）
Additional division: In Azerbaijan, Kyrgyzstan, Romania, and Turkmenistan, the 5250-5350 MHz frequency band is also allocated to the radio navigation service as the main service. （WRC-12）
在5 250-5 350 MHz 频段内，卫星地球探测（有源）业务和空间研究（有源）业务不得对无线电定位业务提出保护要求。第5.43A 款不适用。（WRC-03）

In the 5250-5350 MHz frequency band, satellite Earth exploration (active) services and space research (active) services shall not impose protection requirements on radio positioning services. Clause 5.43A is not applicable. （WRC-03）
操作在5 350-5 570 MHz频段内的卫星地球探测（有源）业务和操作在5 460-5 570 MHz 频段内的空间研究（有源）业务不应对操作在5 350-5 460 MHz 频段内的航空无线电导航业务、操作在5 460-5 470 MHz 频段内的无线电导航业务和操作在5 470-5 570 MHz 频段内的水上无线电导航业务造成有害干扰。（WRC-03）

Satellite Earth exploration (active) services operating in the frequency band of 5350-5570 MHz and space research (active) services operating in the frequency band of 5460-5570 MHz should not cause harmful interference to aviation radio navigation services operating in the frequency band of 5350-5460 MHz, radio navigation services operating in the frequency band of 5460-5470 MHz, and water radio navigation services operating in the frequency band of 5470-5570 MHz. （WRC-03）
操作在5 350-5 460 MHz 频段的空间研究（有源）业务不得对此频段内已划分的其他业务造成有害干扰，或提出保护要求。（WRC-03）

Space research (active) services operating in the frequency band of 5350-5460 MHz shall not cause harmful interference to other services already allocated within this frequency band, or make protection requirements. （WRC-03）
在5 350-5 470 MHz 频段内，无线电定位业务的电台不得对根据5.449 款操作的航空无线电导航业务的雷达系统造成有害干扰，或提出保护要求。（WRC-03）

In the frequency band of 5350-5470 MHz, radio stations for radio positioning services shall not cause harmful interference to radar systems for aviation radio navigation services operated in accordance with Article 5.449, or make protection requirements. （WRC-03）
航空无线电导航业务使用5 350-5 470 MHz 频段，限于机载雷达和有关的机载信标。
The aviation radio navigation service uses the 5-350-5470 MHz frequency band, limited to airborne radar and related airborne beacons.
附加划分：在澳大利亚、阿塞拜疆、伊朗伊斯兰共和国、吉尔吉斯斯坦、罗马尼亚、土库曼斯坦和乌克兰，5 470-5 650 MHz 频段亦划分给作为主要业务的航空无线电导航业务。（WRC-12）

Additional allocation: In Australia, Azerbaijan, the Islamic Republic of Iran, Kyrgyzstan, Romania, Turkmenistan, and Ukraine, the 5470-5650 MHz frequency band is also allocated to the aviation radio navigation service as its main business. （WRC-12）
在5 470-5 725 MHz 频段内，移动业务的电台不得要求无线电定位业务的保护。无线电定位业务不得在系统特性和干扰标准方面对移动业务实行比ITU-R M.1638-0建议书中所述更为严格的保护标准。（WRC-15）

In the frequency band of 5470-5725 MHz, mobile service stations shall not request protection for radio positioning services. The radio positioning service shall not implement stricter protection standards for mobile services in terms of system characteristics and interference standards than those described in ITU-R M.1638-0 Recommendation. （WRC-15）
在5 470-5 650 MHz 频段内，除了在5 600-5 650 MHz 频段内用于气象目的的陆基雷达以外，无线电定位业务的电台不得对水上无线电导航业务的雷达系统造成有害干扰，或提出保护要求。（WRC-03）

In the frequency band of 5470-5650 MHz, except for ground-based radars used for meteorological purposes in the frequency band of 5600-5650 MHz, radio stations for radio positioning services shall not cause harmful interference to radar systems for maritime radio navigation services, or make protection requirements. （WRC-03）
附加划分：在英国，5 470-5 850 MHz 频段以次要使用条件也划分给陆地移动业务。21.2、21.3、21.4 和21.5 款规定的功率限值，应适用于5 725-5 850 MHz 频段。

Additional allocation: In the UK, the 5470-5850 MHz frequency band is also allocated to land mobile services as a secondary usage condition. The power limits specified in sections 21.2, 21.3, 21.4, and 21.5 shall apply to the 5725-5850 MHz frequency band.
在5 600-5 650 MHz 频段内，批准用于气象的陆基雷达与水上无线电导航业务电台以同等条件操作。
Land based radar and water-based radio navigation service stations approved for use in meteorology operate under equal conditions in the 5600-5650 MHz frequency band.
附加划分：在沙特阿拉伯、巴林、孟加拉国、文莱达鲁萨兰国、喀麦隆、中国、刚果共和国、科特迪瓦、吉布提、韩国、埃及、阿拉伯联合酋长国、加蓬、几内亚、赤道

Different types of services: In Azerbaijan, the Russian Federation, Georgia, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, and Turkmenistan, the 5670-5725 MHz frequency band is allocated to space research services as the main service (see Section 5.33). （WRC-12）

已废止。（SUP-WRC-15）
It has been abolished. （SUP-WRC-15）

在澳大利亚、布基纳法索、科特迪瓦、马里和尼日利亚，固定业务在6 440-6 520 MHz（HAPS 到地面方向）和6 560-6 640 MHz（地面到HAPS 方向）的划分也可在这些国家的领土内用于高空平台台站（HAPS）的关口站链路。这种使用仅限于HAPS 关口站链路操作，不得要求现有业务给予保护，亦不得对现有业务造成有害干扰。同时，须符合第150 号决议（WRC-12）。现有业务的未来发展不得受到HAPS 关口站链路的限制。在上述频段使用HAPS 关口站链路，需要与领土位于打算使用HAPS 关口站链路的主管部门边界1 000 公里以内的其它主管部门达成明确协议。（WRC-12）

In Australia, Burkina Faso, C ô te d'Ivoire, Mali, and Nigeria, the division of fixed services between 6440-6520 MHz (HAPS to ground direction) and 6560-6640 MHz (ground to HAPS direction) can also be used for gateway links of high-altitude platform stations (HAPS) within the territories of these countries. This use is limited to HAPS gateway station link operations and shall not require protection from existing services, nor shall it cause harmful interference to existing services. At the same time, it must comply with Resolution 150 (WRC-12). The future development of existing businesses shall not be limited by the HAPS gateway station link. The satellite fixed (ground to air) service uses the 17.3-18.1 GHz frequency band for geostationary satellite systems, limited to the feeder links of satellite broadcasting services. In Zone 2, satellite fixed (ground to air) services use the 17.3-17.8 GHz frequency band, limited to geostationary satellite systems. In Zone 2, the feeder links for satellite broadcasting services in the 12.2-12.7 GHz frequency band use the 17.3-17.8 GHz frequency band, as stated in Article 11. The non geostationary satellite system for satellite fixed services uses the 17.3-18.1 GHz (ground to air) frequency band in Zone 1 and Zone 3, and the 17.8-18.1 GHz (ground to air) frequency band in Zone 2, and needs to be coordinated with other non geostationary satellite systems for satellite fixed services in accordance with Clause 9.12. 在17.3-17.7GHz 频段内，在1 区的卫星固定业务（空对地）的地球站不得对按照附录30A 操作的卫星广播业务馈线链路的地球站提出保护要求，而且不能对在馈线链路服务区域内任何地点的卫星广播业务馈线链路的地球站的位置有任何限制或约束。

For the 18.6-18.8 GHz frequency band, fixed service systems operating in Algeria, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Egypt, United Arab Emirates, Jordan, Lebanon, Libya, Morocco, Oman, Qatar, Syria, Tunisia, and Yemen as of the date of the last document of the World Radiocommunication Conference (WRC-2000) in 2000 are not subject to the restrictions of section 21.5A. （WRC-2000）
已废止。（SUP-WRC-2000）
It has been abolished. （SUP-WRC-2000）

对地静止和非对地静止卫星固定业务网络使用18.8-19.3 GHz（空对地）和28.6-29.1 GHz（地对空）频段应援用9.11A 款的各项规定，22.2 款的规定不再适用。为了达成让相关各方都能接受的结果，在1995 年11 月18 日之前进入协调程序的对地静止卫星网络的主管部门应当尽最大可能依照9.11A 款的规定与无线通信局在此日期前收到通知资料的非对地静止卫星网络进行协调。非对地静止卫星网络不得对其完整的附录4 的通知资料被无线通信局认为在1995 年11 月18 日之前已经收到的对地静止卫星固定业务网络造成有害干扰。（WRC-97）

The provisions of Article 9.11A shall apply to the use of the 18.8-19.3 GHz (air to ground) and 28.6-29.1 GHz (ground to air) frequency bands in both geostationary and non geostationary satellite fixed service networks, and the provisions of Article 22.2 shall no longer apply. In order to achieve a result that is acceptable to all parties involved, the competent authority of the geostationary satellite network that entered the coordination procedure before November 18, 1995 should coordinate with the non geostationary satellite network that received notification materials from the wireless communication bureau before this date as much as possible in accordance with the provisions of Article 9.11A. Non geostationary satellite networks shall not cause harmful interference to the fixed service network of geostationary satellites that have been received before November 18, 1995, as deemed by the Wireless Communications Authority, based on the complete notification materials in Appendix 4. （WRC-97）
卫星固定业务使用19.3-19.6 GHz（地对空）频段限于卫星移动业务非对地静止系统的馈线链路。并应援用9.11A 款，而22.2 款不适用。

The use of the 19.3-19.6 GHz (ground to air) frequency band for satellite fixed services is limited to feeder links of non geostationary systems for satellite mobile services. Clause 9.11A should be used, while Clause 22.2 is not applicable.
《无线电规则》22.2 款将在19.3-19.6 GHz 和29.1-29.4 GHz 频段继续适用于其完整的附录4 的协调资料或通知资料被无线通信局认为在1995 年11 月18 日之前已经收到的非对地静止移动卫星业务网络的馈线链路和卫星固定业务网络。（WRC-97）

Article 22.2 of the Radio Regulations shall continue to apply in the frequency bands of 19.3-19.6 GHz and 29.1-29.4 GHz to the feeder links and satellite fixed service networks of non geostationary mobile satellite service networks that the Wireless Communications Authority considers to have been received before November 18, 1995, in accordance with the complete coordination or notification materials in Appendix 4. （WRC-97）
卫星固定业务对地静止卫星系统和卫星移动业务非对地静止卫星系统的馈线链路使用19.3-19.7 GHz（空对地）频段须援用9.11A 款的各项规定，而不是22.2 款的规定。此频段用于卫星固定业务其他非对地静止卫星系统，或5.523C 和5.523E 款中所示的应用时不需援用9.11A 款的规定，而应继续按照第9 条（9.11A 款除外）和第11 条的程序以及22.2 款的规定。（WRC-97）

The use of the 19.3-19.7 GHz (air to ground) frequency band for feeder links of fixed satellite services to geostationary satellite systems and satellite mobile services to non geostationary satellite systems must comply with the provisions of Article 9.11A, not Article 22.2. When this frequency band is used for satellite fixed services, other non geostationary satellite systems, or applications as shown in sections 5.523C and 5.523E, the provisions of section 9.11A do not need to be invoked, and the procedures of sections 9 (excluding section 9.11A) and 11, as well as the provisions of section 22.2, should continue to be followed. （WRC-97）
《无线电规则》22.2 款将在19.6-19.7 GHz 和29.4-29.5 GHz 频段中继续适用于非对地静止卫星移动业务网路的馈线链路和其完整的附录4 协调资料或通知资料被无线电通信局认为在1997 年11 月21 日前已经收到的卫星固定业务网络。（WRC-97）

Article 22.2 of the Radio Regulations will continue to apply to feeder links of non geostationary satellite mobile service networks in the frequency bands of 19.6-19.7 GHz and 29.4-29.5 GHz, as well as to satellite fixed service networks whose complete Appendix 4 coordination or notification data is considered received by the Radio Communications Authority before November 21, 1997. （WRC-97）

In the frequency bands of 19.7-20.2GHz (Zone 2) and 29.5-30GHz, as well as the frequency bands of 20.1-20.2GHz and 29.9-30GHz in Zones 1 and 3, the networks for satellite fixed services and satellite mobile services may include links between various earth stations at designated or unspecified locations, or between various earth stations communicating point-to-point and point to multipoint through one or more satellites in motion

给卫星移动业务的划分旨在空间电台使用窄的点波束天线和其他先进技术的网络。在2 区，在19.7-20.1 GHz 和20.1-20.2 GHz 频段操作卫星移动业务系统的各主管部门应采取一切切实可行的措施，保证这些频段可供那些按照5.524 款的规定操作固定和移动系统的主管部门继续使用。

The division of satellite mobile services aims to use narrow spot beam antennas and other advanced technologies in space radio networks. In Zone 2, the competent authorities operating satellite mobile service systems in the frequency bands of 19.7-20.1 GHz and 20.1-20.2 GHz shall take all feasible measures to ensure that these frequency bands are available for continued use by the competent authorities operating fixed and mobile systems in accordance with the provisions of Article 5.524.
在2 区，卫星移动业务使用19.7-20.1 GHz 和29.5-29.9 GHz 频段限于5.526 款中所述的卫星固定业务和卫星移动业务的卫星网络。

In the 21.4-22 GHz frequency band, in order to promote the development of satellite broadcasting services, it is encouraged that the competent departments of Zone 1 and Zone 3 do not deploy mobile service stations, and limit the deployment of fixed service stations to point-to-point links. （WRC-12）

卫星固定业务（地对空）在1 区对24.65-25.25 GHz 频段和在3 区对24.65-24.75 GHz 频段的使用限于使用最小天线直径为4.5 米的地球站。（WRC-12）

卫星间业务不得对无线电导航业务的机场地面探测设备电台的有害干扰提出保护要求。

在28.5-30 GHz 频段，卫星地球探测业务限于电台之间数据传输，通过有源或无源探测器收集原始信息则不受此限制。

In the frequency band of 28.5-30 GHz, satellite Earth exploration services are limited to data transmission between radio stations, and the collection of raw information through active or passive detectors is not subject to this restriction.
在29.1-29.5 GHz（地对空）频段的卫星移动业务非对地静止卫星网络馈线链路和卫星固定业务对地静止卫星网络应采用上行链路自适应功率控制或其他的衰减补偿方

In the frequency range of 29.1-29.5 GHz (ground to air), non geostationary satellite network feeder links for satellite mobile services and geostationary satellite networks for satellite fixed services should adopt uplink adaptive power control or other attenuation compensation methods
附加划分：在阿尔及利亚、沙特阿拉伯、巴林、文莱达鲁萨兰国、喀麦隆、中国、刚果共和国、埃及、阿拉伯联合酋长国、厄立特里亚、埃塞俄比亚、几内亚、印度、
Additional divisions: in Algeria, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Brunei Darussalam, Cameroon, China, Republic of Congo, Egypt, United Arab Emirates, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Guinea, India
29.95-30 GHz 频段以次要使用条件用于以遥测、跟踪、控制为目的的卫星地球探测业务的空对空链路。
The frequency band of 29.95-30 GHz is primarily used for air-to-air links in satellite Earth exploration services for telemetry, tracking, and control purposes.
在不丹、喀麦隆、韩国、俄罗斯联邦、印度、印度尼西亚、伊朗（伊斯兰共和国）、伊拉克、日本、哈萨克斯坦、马来西亚、马尔代夫、蒙古、缅甸、乌兹别克斯坦、
In Bhutan, Cameroon, South Korea, Russian Federation, India, Indonesia, Iran (Islamic Republic of), Iraq, Japan, Kazakhstan, Malaysia, Maldives, Mongolia, Myanmar, Uzbekistan
在31-31.3 GHz 频段，第21 条的表21-4 中规定的功率通量密度限值，应适用于空间研究业务。
In the frequency band of 31-31.3 GHz, the power flux density limits specified in Table 21-4 of Article 21 shall apply to space research services.
不同业务种类：在亚美尼亚、格鲁吉亚、吉尔吉斯斯坦、塔吉克斯坦和土库曼斯坦，31-31.3 GHz 频段划分给作为主要业务的空间研究业务（见第5.33 款）。（WRC-12）

Different types of services: In Armenia, Georgia, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, and Turkmenistan, the 31-31.3 GHz frequency band is allocated to space research services as the main service (see Section 5.33). （WRC-12）
不同业务种类：在沙特阿拉伯、亚美尼亚、阿塞拜疆、白俄罗斯、埃及、阿拉伯联合酋长国、西班牙、爱沙尼亚、俄罗斯联邦、格鲁吉亚、匈牙利、伊朗伊斯兰共和国、
Different types of business: in Saudi Arabia, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Egypt, United Arab Emirates, Spain, Estonia, Russian Federation, Georgia, Hungary, Islamic Republic of Iran

31.8-33.4 GHz、37-40 GHz、40.5-43.5 GHz、51.4-52.6 GHz、55.78-59 GHz 和64-66 GHz 频段可用于固定业务的高密度应用（见第75 号决议（WRC-2000））。各主管部门在审议与这些频段相关的规则性条款时应顾及这一点。由于可能会在39.5-40 GHz 和40.5-42 GHz 频段部署卫星固定业务的高密度应用（见第5.516B 款），各主管部门应酌情进一步考虑对固定业务中高密度应用的潜在限制。（WRC-07）

The frequency bands of 31.8-33.4 GHz, 37-40 GHz, 40.5-43.5 GHz, 51.4-52.6 GHz, 55.78-59 GHz, and 64-66 GHz can be used for high-density applications of fixed services (see Resolution No. 75 (WRC-2000)). When reviewing regulatory provisions related to these frequency bands, the competent authorities should take this into consideration. Due to the possibility of deploying high-density applications of satellite fixed services in the 39.5-40 GHz and 40.5-42 GHz frequency bands (see Section 5.516B), regulatory authorities should further consider potential limitations on high-density applications in fixed services at their discretion. （WRC-07）
主管部门应当采取切实可行的措施减小在31.8-33.4 GHz 频段固定业务电台与无线电导航业务机载电台之间的潜在干扰，同时考虑机载雷达系统的操作需要。

The competent authorities should take practical measures to reduce potential interference between fixed service radio stations and radio navigation service airborne radio stations in the 31.8-33.4 GHz frequency band, while considering the operational needs of airborne radar systems.
替代划分：在美国，31.8-32 GHz 频段以主要使用条件划分给无线电导航业务和空间研究（深空）（空对地）业务。（WRC-97）
Alternative allocation: In the United States, the 31.8-32 GHz frequency band is primarily allocated for radio navigation services and space research (deep space) (air to ground) services. （WRC-97）
替代划分：在美国，32-32.3 GHz 频段以主要使用条件划分给无线电导航业务和空间研究（深空）（空对地）业务。（WRC-03）
Alternative allocation: In the United States, the 32-32.3 GHz frequency band is primarily allocated for radio navigation services and space research (deep space) (air to ground) services. （WRC-03）
替代划分：在美国，32.3-33 GHz 频段以主要使用条件划分给卫星间和无线电导航业务。（WRC-97）
Alternative allocation: In the United States, the 32.3-33 GHz frequency band is primarily allocated for satellite to satellite and radio navigation services. （WRC-97）
替代划分：在美国，33-33.4 GHz 频段以主要使用条件划分给无线电导航业务。（WRC-97）
Alternative allocation: In the United States, the 33-33.4 GHz frequency band is primarily allocated for radio navigation services. （WRC-97）
主管部门在设计用于32.3-33 GHz 频段的卫星间业务、32-33 GHz 频段的无线电导航业务、31.8-32.3 GHz 频段的空间研究（深空）业务的系统时，应采取一切必要的措施防止这些业务之间造成有害干扰，并关注无线电导航业务的安全问题（见第707 号建议）。

When designing systems for satellite to satellite services in the 32.3-33 GHz frequency band, radio navigation services in the 32-33 GHz frequency band, and space research (deep space) services in the 31.8-32.3 GHz frequency band, the competent authorities should take all necessary measures to prevent harmful interference between these services and pay attention to the safety issues of radio navigation services (see Recommendation No. 707).
附加划分：在沙特阿拉伯、巴林、孟加拉国、埃及、阿拉伯联合酋长国、加蓬、印度尼西亚、伊朗伊斯兰共和国、伊拉克、以色列、约旦、科威特、黎巴嫩、利比亚、马
Additional divisions: in Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Bangladesh, Egypt, United Arab Emirates, Gabon, Indonesia, Iran (Islamic Republic of), Iraq, Israel, Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Libya, Malaysia
在35.5-36.0 GHz 频段内，在离波束中心超过0.8°的任何角度上，卫星地球探测业务（有源）和空间研究业务（有源）的星载传感器在地球表面所产生的平均功率通量密度不应超过73.3 dB（W/m2）。（WRC-03）

In the frequency range of 35.5-36.0 GHz, at any angle above 0.8 ° from the beam center, the average power flux density generated by onboard sensors for satellite Earth exploration services (active) and space research services (active) on the Earth's surface should not exceed 73.3 dB (W/m2). （WRC-03）
不同业务种类：在亚美尼亚、阿塞拜疆、白俄罗斯、俄罗斯联邦、格鲁吉亚、吉尔吉斯斯坦、塔吉克斯坦和土库曼斯坦，34.7-35.2 GHz 频段划分给作为主要业务的空间研究业务（见第5.33 款）。（WRC-12）

Different business types: In Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, the Russian Federation, Georgia, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, and Turkmenistan, the 34.7-35.2 GHz frequency band is allocated to space research services as the main business (see Section 5.33). （WRC-12）
对于36-37 GHz 频段卫星地球探测（无源）业务和固定业务以及移动业务之间的共用，第752 号决议（WRC-07）须适用。（WRC-07）
Resolution 752 (WRC-07) shall apply to the sharing of satellite Earth exploration (passive) services, fixed services, and mobile services in the 36-37 GHz frequency band. （WRC-07）

5.551G  已废止。（SUP-WRC-03）
5.551H  在42-42.5 GHz 频段内运行的卫星固定业务（空对地）或卫星广播业务的任何非对地静止卫星系统的所有空间电台在42.5-43.5 GHz 频段产生的等效功率通量密度（epfd），不得在超过2%的时间内，在任何射电天文电台台址超过下述各值：
		在任何以单反天文望远镜登记的射电天文电台台址，在42.5-43.5 GHz 频段中，1 GHz 为–230 dB（W/m2），每500 kHz 为–246 dB（W/m2）；

5.551F Different types of services: In Japan, the 41.5-42.5 GHz frequency band is primarily used for mobile services (see section 5.33). （WRC-97）
5.551G has been abolished. （SUP-WRC-03）
The equivalent power flux density (epfd) generated by all space stations of any non geostationary satellite system operating in the 42-42.5 GHz frequency band for satellite fixed services (air to ground) or satellite broadcasting services shall not exceed the following values at any radio astronomy station site for more than 2% of the time:
At any radio astronomy radio station site registered with a DSLR astronomical telescope, in the 42.5-43.5 GHz frequency band, 1 GHz is -230 dB (W/m2), and every 500 kHz is -246 dB (W/m2);
At any radio astronomy station site registered with a very long baseline interferometer, the frequency range of 42.5-43.5 GHz is -209 dB (W/m2) per 500 kHz.

47.2-47.5 GHz 和47.9-48.2 GHz 频段对固定业务的划分是指定给高空平流层电台使用的。对47.2-47.5 GHz 和47.9-48.2 GHz 频段的使用须遵守第122 决议（WRC-07，修订版）的规定。（WRC-07）
5.553  陆地移动业务电台可以在43.5-47 GHz 和66-71 GHz 频段上工作，但不得对这些频段已划分的空间无线电通信业务造成有害干扰（见5.43 款）。（WRC-2000）
5.554  在43.5-47 GHz、66-71 GHz、95-100 GHz、123-130 GHz、191.8-200 GHz 和252-265 GHz 频段，用于与卫星移动业务或卫星无线电导航业务配合使用的卫星链路也准许与指定固定地点的陆地电台连接。（WRC-2000）
5.554A  卫星固定业务（空对地）使用47.5-47.9 GHz，48.2-48.54 GHz 和49.44-50.2 GHz频段，限于对地静止的卫星。（WRC-03）
5.555  附加划分：48.94-49.04 GHz 频段以主要使用条件也划分给射电天文业务。

The division of fixed services in the 47.2-47.5 GHz and 47.9-48.2 GHz frequency bands is designated for use by high-altitude stratospheric radio stations. The use of the 47.2-47.5 GHz and 47.9-48.2 GHz frequency bands must comply with the provisions of Resolution 122 (WRC-07, revised edition). （WRC-07）
5.553 Land mobile service radio stations can operate in the 43.5-47 GHz and 66-71 GHz frequency bands, but must not cause harmful interference to the space radio communication services that have been allocated in these frequency bands (see section 5.43). （WRC-2000）
5.554 In the frequency bands of 43.5-47 GHz, 66-71 GHz, 95-100 GHz, 123-130 GHz, 191.8-200 GHz, and 252-265 GHz, satellite links used in conjunction with satellite mobile services or satellite radio navigation services are also allowed to connect with designated fixed location land stations. （WRC-2000）
5.554A satellite fixed service (air to ground) uses frequency bands of 47.5-47.9 GHz, 48.2-48.54 GHz, and 49.44-50.2 GHz, limited to geostationary satellites. （WRC-03）
5.555 Additional division: The 48.94-49.04 GHz frequency band is also designated for radio astronomy services as its primary usage condition.

在74-76 GHz 频段，固定业务、移动业务和广播业务的电台，不得对卫星固定业务电台以及按照卫星广播业务频率指配规划大会的有关决定进行工作的卫星广播电台造成有害干扰。（WRC-2000）
5.561A  81-81.5 GHz 频段以次要使用条件也划分给业余业务和卫星业余业务。

In the 74-76 GHz frequency band, radio stations for fixed services, mobile services, and broadcasting services shall not cause harmful interference to satellite fixed service radio stations and satellite broadcasting radio stations operating in accordance with the relevant decisions of the Satellite Broadcasting Service Frequency Allocation Planning Conference. （WRC-2000）
The secondary usage conditions of the 5.561A 81-81.5 GHz frequency band are also divided into amateur services and satellite amateur services.
卫星间业务使用174.8-182 GHz 和185-190 GHz 频段，限于对地静止轨道的卫星。卫星间业务电台产生的单向输入功率通量密度，在任何条件、任何调制方式下，在地球表面以上0 至1 000 公里的任何海拔高度，在被无源传感器占用的所有对地静止卫星轨道位置附近，对于所有到达角都不得超过144 dB（W/（m2·MHz））。（WRC-2000）

Inter satellite services use the 174.8-182 GHz and 185-190 GHz frequency bands, limited to satellites in geostationary orbit. The unidirectional input power flux density generated by inter satellite service radio stations shall not exceed -144 dB (W/(m2 · MHz)) for all arrival angles at any altitude of 0 to 1000 kilometers above the Earth's surface, under any conditions and modulation methods, near all geostationary satellite orbit positions occupied by passive sensors. （WRC-2000）
已废止。（SUP-WRC-03）

在200-209 GHz、235-238 GHz、250-252 GHz 和265-275 GHz 频段可进行陆基无源大气传感，用于监测大气的构成。（WRC-2000）
Ground based passive atmospheric sensing can be performed in the frequency bands of 200-209 GHz, 235-238 GHz, 250-252 GHz, and 265-275 GHz to monitor the composition of the atmosphere. （WRC-2000）
237.9-238 GHz 频段也划分给卫星地球探测（有源）业务和空间研究（有源）业务，限用于星载云层雷达。（WRC-2000）
The 237.9-238 GHz frequency band is also allocated for satellite Earth exploration (active) services and space research (active) services, limited to satellite cloud radar. （WRC-2000）
